This vulnerability is severe as it can lead to loss of control over the contract and draining of funds. reason: The function 'changeOwner' transfers Ether to the current owner using 'owner.transfer(msg.value)' and 'owner.transfer(this.balance)' before updating the 'owner' state variable to '_newowner'.
